00181 // - Inlined functions
00182 
00183 inline bool
00184 TrafficPointRequest::requestDone()
00185 {
00186    return (m_state == DONE) || (m_state == ERROR);
00187 }
00188 
00189 inline StringTable::stringCode
00190 TrafficPointRequest::getStatus() const
00191 {
00192    switch ( m_state ) {
00193       case DONE:
00194          return StringTable::OK;
00195       case ERROR:
00196          return StringTable::NOTFOUND;
00197       default:
00198          return StringTable::TIMEOUT_ERROR;
00199    };
00200 }
00201 
00202 inline const TrafficPointRequest::result_t&
00203 TrafficPointRequest::getTrafficPoint() const
00204 {
00205    return m_resultIDs;
00206 }
